message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I take $60, you take $40. It's a good deal for both of us considering the inflation.
I think we can do better than that. Let's split it more evenly. 55 for me, 45 for you.
Bob, it's our last chance to make a good deal. I'll take a slight hit with $55, you get $45.  Let's settle this before the inflation eats away at our potential gains.
